title: Educational Content Lifecycle Management: Standard-Based Sustainable Model Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in educational content development and understanding of standards-based instructional design frameworks
context.additional_context: Strengthening lifecycle management competencies for customized educational content in professional training programs for medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Design content development processes by applying educational standard specifications such as SCORM and xAPI.
Establish a sustainable content management system through institution-specific customization strategies and integration of open-source tools.
Develop standard-based content editing workflows applicable in real educational settings through project-based practical exercises.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
